name: 足払い
caption: This hit? Good job! You can start winning now.
notes: On hit 強制ダウン+44 when cancelled instantly into Hammerfall Brake (HFB)

name: 2HS
caption: Send them to heaven or die trying
notes: On Counter Hit: 強制ダウン(+73)

name: 2S
caption:
Truly puts stagger in &quot
stagger pressure&quot

name: ダスト
caption: Surprise mixup tool
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on ground hit: 16F
Floating crumple on ground hit: Total 28F (airborne hitstun 1-11F, standing hitstun 12-18F, can block 19-28F)
R.I.S.C. Loss in [ ] refers to when 5D is not the initial hit of a combo.
Wall Damage in ( ) refers to if opponent is touching the wall.
Has no additional Combo Decay on initial hit, unlike other overheads (usually adding +5 on initial hit for 10 total).
Telegraphing orange glow appears on frame 4, and reaches full brightness on frame 5.

name: 溜めダスト
notes:
Hitstop on block: 20F
Hitstop on raw hit: 45F
Properties for opponent on block follow Level 4 rules.
R.I.S.C. Loss in [ ] refers to when 5[D] is not the initial hit of a combo.
Wall Damage in ( ) refers to if opponent is touching the wall.
Wall Damage when hit raw is increased to 700 (900).
Applies 5 less Combo Decay on initial hit, for 0 Combo Decay if the first hit of a combo.
Telegraphing orange glow appears on frame 4, and reaches full brightness on frame 5.

name: 6K
caption: ''Kara Cancels: My death was ... greatly exaggerated.''

notes: If the first hit of a combo, applies an additional +20 Combo Decay.

name: jD
caption: If I don't know what side I'm on, neither do you.

name: ワイルドアサルト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
notes:
Guard crush duration: 35F
Adds additional momentum on cancels except Backdash and Backward Jump.
Staggers on grounded hit. Listed on-hit value is for gold (fast) recovery.
Total stagger duration: 34F (1-26F hitstun, 27-34F can block only)
Hitstun duration is increased by 4F for red (normal) recovery, and 8F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (30F and 34F respectively)
Total duration is increased by 5F for red (normal) recovery, and 10F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (39F and 44F respectively)

input: 溜めワイルドアサルト(236[D])
name: 溜めワイルドアサルト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
notes:
Guard crush duration: 39F
Adds additional momentum on cancels except Backdash and Backward Jump.

name: 投げ
caption: A gateway to Garuda
notes:
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15

name: 空投げ
caption: Get back down here!
notes:
Air Throws have both normal recovery (which recovers CH) and special recovery frames upon landing (not CH). It is technically possible to recover mid-air from a whiffed Air Throw, but it usually doesn't happen unless done from very high in the air.
Opponent cannot use Blue Psych Burst on hit or the resulting knockdown.
On-Hit value is for attacker's IAD height, except for Potemkin and Nagoriyuki, who have their instant Air Throw height instead.
Frame advantage decreases as height increases (+32 to +39).
Builds 1000 Tension once all damage is dealt.
On hit, applies an increased 25 Combo Decay.
Properties change if Roman Canceled before all damage is dealt:
* Reduces positive R.I.S.C. by 25% before applying R.I.S.C. Loss, similar to regular strikes.
* R.I.S.C. Loss: 1000
* Proration: Forced 75%
* Combo Decay on hit: 15

name: ガルダインパクト
guard: 上段(ガードクラッシュ)
caption: His most oppressive oki tool
notes:
Guard Crush duration: 53F
Deals 295 wall damage on block.
Clash Level: 3
Clash Hits: 1
Projectile continues on being Purple Roman Cancelled from frame 28 onwards.
Staggers on grounded hit. Listed on-hit value is for gold (fast) recovery.
Total stagger duration: 59F (1-51F hitstun, 52-59F can block only)
Hitstun duration is increased by 4F for red (normal) recovery, and 8F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (55F and 59F respectively)
Total duration is increased by 5F for red (normal) recovery, and 10F for blue (slow) and no recovery. (64F and 69F respectively)
Opponents can be thrown while staggered, allowing comboing into throws. During the 'can only block' stage at the end of stagger, the opponent cannot jump to escape throws, meaning there is more time to combo into throws than strikes.
Stagger does not gain 1 addition hitstun on crouching hit, unlike other attacks.

name: F.D.B.
notes:
Reflects projectile starting on frame 4 until active frames
Upon reflecting a projectile, fully invulnerable until end of recovery
Cannot reflect Overdrive projectiles
On Counter Hit: 強制ダウン(+59)

name: メガフィスト・後方
caption: The pose for Backward Mega Fist differs slightly.
notes:
Lower hurtbox is slightly retracted on frame 3
Potemkin is airborne on frame 3
Horizontal Activation Range: 0-3000 - ''Cannot hit as a crossup.''
Moves backwards during initial movement on frames 1~31
Decreases Tension Balance during the initial movement, for a total of --3069 Tension Balance.
Increases Negative value during the initial movement, for a total  1240~2573 Negative value (amount varies and increases with distance to the opponent).

name: 溜めF.D.B.
notes:
Reflects projectile starting on frame 4 until active frames

name: スライドヘッド
caption: Yet another anti-zoning tool
notes:
Has 1 hit of armor starting on frame 5 until (and including) active frames
Technically a projectile that spawns during startup, but gets instantly destroyed when Purple Roman Cancelled, unlike other projectiles. However, it stays on a YRC hit, punishing YRC's recovery in the process.

''Does'' apply 25% R.I.S.C. Loss reduction on hit, unlike other hitgrabs.
50 damage on block (∴ 25 chip damage).
Vertical Activation Range: 50-5500. ''Heat Knuckle will not hit airborne backdashes or very low airborne wallsplats. Maximum height is irrelevant - no one can get this far up.''

name: Reflect Projectile
notes:
The lower bound of the advantage on-block and on-hit applies when the projectile connects on its first active frame. The upper bound of the advantage applies when the projectile connects after Potemkin has exited recovery.

Clash Hits: 1

name: ヘブンリーポチョムキンバスター
caption:
Carried by Potemkin to heaven.&amp
nbsp
jpeg of your afterlife
notes:
Vertical Activation Range: 500 (From Potemkin's current position).
Minimum damage scaling - 50%

input: ガイガンダー改バリア(Mirror)
name: ガイガンダー改バリア
notes:
Projectile will continue if Purple Roman Canceled on frame 16 at the earliest.
Clash Level: 5
Clash Hits: -
The barrier will appear in front of Potemkin immediately after the initial strike, and will slowly move forward for several seconds before vanishing.
Barrier only disappears once its duration ends or it hits the opponent 3 times.
If the barrier reaches a corner its duration will be slightly reduced, however it also slows to a stop to ensure that the opponent can take all 3 hits.
After connecting with an opponent, Giganter cannot hit the opponent for 32F, meaning it hits every 33F (exactly timed with the blockstun). This does not affect how often it can hit other projectiles.
